column4: so, nobody else has any ideas on how to get my firefox to work again?
Say again please what is wrong with firefox?
Tried a dpkg-reconfigure?
of what? firefox itself?
Yes.
I miss open firmware :(
easyubuntu, not Ubuntu
how?
installed firefox-ubuntu-themes and changed the theme from the default
never mind -- still crashes
When you removed it to re install did you -purge ?
yes
that's not quite right. you need a /dev node
Not with diskutil you don't, the volume name works just fine.
not as a partial pathname. "/" would work best then
sorry, I meant to put the /Volumes/ , but still, / would be much easier than that, I did it from a liveCD last I did it so it wasn't / :)
because it spews garbage to the terminal, which leads one to close the terminal, thereby also closing the app
Is that really it, lol I thought is was a technical problem not a pebkac preventer :)
there is also the tendency of GUIs to do very gag-inducing things when they get root access in general
Wow, I hadn't seen the software-sopurces app before, much easier than explaining to people how to edit thier sources.list :)
But this new one has a much easier interface IMHO than synaptic did for repos.
in 5.10, yes. however, the 6.06 one already had the simplicity you're looking for. as the matter of fact, IMHO, the 6.06 one had an even easier interface than the 6.10 one
